messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]censorship, list manners
messages.msgSnippet: **But the responsibility of discovering whether those theories are lousy or not lies with the one seeking knowledge, not with those dishing it out. Obviously
messages.messageBody:
**But the responsibility of discovering whether those theories are lousy or
not lies with the one seeking knowledge, not with those dishing it out.
Obviously if I am fully convinced by a philosophy I *can't* be objective so
you shouldn't take what I say as truth. If there's something you like about
the philosophy you should ask questions and think about it and decide for
yourself if it will work for your goals. But you shouldn't expect me to
compromise my beliefs (or others to compromise their beleifs) so you can
have easy access to other points of view.**


Awesome, Joyce. You really laid out clearly what has been a sticky
point on this list many times. I think this paragraph is a keeper.


Betsy
